projects.items.debAndLopers.title: Deb&Lopers – State-Driven Restaurant Management System
projects.items.debAndLopers.shortDescrip: Full-stack system with role-based access control and an order flow modeled as a state machine.
projects.items.debAndLopers.context: Academic project (UTN · PPS) focused on architecture, backend validations, and mobile experience.
projects.items.debAndLopers.responsibili: Modeled the order lifecycle as a state machine, implemented role-based access control, centralized business logic in services, and enforced server-side validations to prevent invalid state transitions.
projects.items.debAndLopers.detail.probl: The main challenge was coordinating multiple actors (customer, waiter, and kitchen) while preventing inconsistencies in the order workflow. Without strict rules, orders could reach invalid states, be duplicated, or move forward without proper validation.
projects.items.debAndLopers.detail.solut: I modeled the order lifecycle as an explicit state machine with controlled transitions. Every state change is validated on the backend, ensuring role consistency and preventing manipulation from the frontend.
projects.items.debAndLopers.detail.respo: Defined the data model and state transition rules, centralized business logic in services as the single source of truth, and structured role-based access with clearly separated frontend and backend responsibilities.
projects.items.clinicaOnline.title: Online Clinic – Medical Management System
projects.items.clinicaOnline.shortDescri: Full-stack application for appointment and patient management with structured permission control and validations.
projects.items.clinicaOnline.context: Academic project focused on modularization, security, and separation of responsibilities.
projects.items.clinicaOnline.responsibil: Designed the data model, implemented session and permission control, enforced backend validations, and organized the system in a modular and maintainable structure.
projects.items.clinicaOnline.detail.prob: The main challenge was organizing appointment and patient management while preventing scheduling conflicts, unauthorized access, and inconsistent system states.
projects.items.clinicaOnline.detail.solu: I structured the system into independent modules with centralized backend validations. Role-based access control and clear business rules ensured safe creation and modification of appointments.
projects.items.clinicaOnline.detail.resp: Designed the data model, defined business rules for appointments and users, implemented server-side validations, and structured the architecture with a clear separation between logic, data, and presentation.
projects.items.salaDeJuegos.title: Game Room – Interactive Application with State Management
projects.items.salaDeJuegos.shortDescrip: Interactive application with multiple game modes and real-time ranking.
projects.items.salaDeJuegos.context: Academic project focused on frontend state management and user experience.
projects.items.salaDeJuegos.responsibili: Implemented game logic, synchronized data with Firestore, and optimized frontend state handling and performance.
projects.items.salaDeJuegos.detail.probl: The challenge was maintaining consistent scoring and ranking while multiple users interacted in real time, avoiding frontend state inconsistencies.
projects.items.salaDeJuegos.detail.solut: I implemented explicit state handling for each game and controlled synchronization with Firestore to ensure consistent ranking updates.
projects.items.salaDeJuegos.detail.respo: Developed game logic, structured frontend state management, and optimized database communication to reduce inconsistencies.
projects.items.portfolio.title: Professional Portfolio

projects.items.portfolio.detail.solution: I designed a modular architecture with a custom translation system, feature-based structure, and standalone Angular components.
